Class BaseRoom

java.lang.Object
  




public abstract class BaseRoom
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract parent object for inheritence with StandardRoom and FamilyRoom classes. Represents common parameters and functionality across room types.

Version:
19/11/2015 Version 1.1
Author:
Richard Kilgour
